dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.customer.bill.CustomerBillSpec
dataStructure.description:
A detailed description of a customer's bill structure. The current version of this class is serving as a placeholder. It will be further developed in the next version of this document.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: CustomerBillSpec

child.name: name
child.description:
A short descriptive name.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: name

child.name: description
child.description:
A narrative that explains in detail the specification.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period for which the CustomerBillSpec is valid.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor
